name: Special Civil Servant
author: Kwon Sora
content: Socially-awkward Maru Han bombs his fifth attempt at getting a dream job in the civil service. But after a strange creature attacks him in the mountains, he finds himself recruited into the Special Civil Service for the Ministry of Environment. This secret organization is dedicated to fighting nachal, human-devouring demons who appear in clouds of yellow dust.
